scripts.dev: env-cmd -f .env concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd frontend && yarn start" "cd backend && yarn dev"
scripts.start: env-cmd -f .env concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd frontend && yarn build && yarn start" "cd backend && yarn build && yarn start"
scripts.start:back: cd backend && env-cmd -f ../.env yarn build && yarn start
scripts.start:front: cd frontend && env-cmd -f ../.env yarn build && yarn start
